amendment.description: To provide for the extension of certain expiring provisions, and for other purposes.

action.text: By Unanimous Consent, Amendment SA 2687, previously agreed to, and previously designated a second degree amendment, was modified to reflect a first degree status. By unanimous consent, Amendment SA 2687 was subsequently amended by Amendment SA 2882.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2687 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2687 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Bayh to Amendment SA 2686. (consideration: CR S2211-2217) To provide for the extension of certain expiring provisions, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2687 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2687 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Bayh to Amendment SA 2686.
